effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a lampent into chandelure, a misdreavus into mismagius, or a murkrow into honchkrow.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves a Lampent into Chandelure, a Misdreavus into Mismagius, or a Murkrow into Honchkrow.

flavor_text_entries.text: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It holds shadows as dark as can be.
